message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this valuable product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you for $200. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can we meet in the middle somewhere?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $200 represents the value I place on this product, I understand your budget constraints.  How about we meet halfway at $160?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $160 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. Can we meet in the middle again?
